snippet.title: Clickertale 3 - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Join Clickertale Discord: https://discord.gg/6fbfuCF

Finally, after almost two years of waiting, Clickertale 3 will be released very soon and it will not be disappointing.

Clickertale 3 is one of the biggest and most original Undertale fan-games you will ever see. It combines multiple game genres, like Bullet Hell; RPG, and Clicker. 

Clickertale series has come through a long way of almost 4 years and during all this time it has been upgrading to this point of being a huge fan-game with long storyline and gameplay. I have to say thank you to YouTubers that have been recording the series supporting the games this way. If not for them, all of this would not happen.

Play Clickertale 1: https://gamejolt.com/games/clickertale-undertale-clicker/133393
Play Clickertale 2: https://gamejolt.com/games/clickertale2/249516
Play Clickertale 3: https://gamejolt.com/games/clickertale3/528743
Play Clickerrune: https://gamejolt.com/games/clickerrune/377434
